author: breser
msg: swig-py: prevent a segfaulting function from being called.  Also hide it
from swig-pl where it is unusable (raises a TypeError(!?) if called).

author: cnauroth
msg: HDFS-4594. WebHDFS open sets Content-Length header to what is specified by length parameter rather than how much data is actually returned. Contributed by Chris Nauroth.
